statements: DELETE FROM delivery_routes WHERE vehicle_id = 3 AND start_location = 'Warehouse' AND end_location = 'Customer A';
DELETE FROM delivery_routes WHERE route_id = 100 AND vehicle_id = 200;
DELETE FROM delivery_routes WHERE start_location = 'Warehouse A' AND end_location = 'Customer X';

DELETE FROM deliveries WHERE route_id = 5 AND completed = false;
DELETE FROM deliveries WHERE completed = TRUE;
DELETE FROM route_stops WHERE stop_id = 10 AND route_id = 3;
DELETE FROM routes WHERE time_estimated > 60 AND distance < 1000;
